CustomField.description: -Ability to multi-task and be able to handle multiple projects. -Timely follow-up, execution, and resolving logged errors -Ensuring all project deliverables, budgets and timelines are met -Coordination of the estimation, planning, tracking, and execution of local IT solutions -Establishing and maintaining strong, strategic partnerships with vendors and service suppliers -Responsible for Vendor Management and ensuring Service Level Agreements are met.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Ability to multi-task and be able to handle multiple projects. -Timely follow-up, execution, and resolving logged errors -Ensuring all project deliverables, budgets and timelines are met -Coordination of the estimation, planning, tracking, and execution of local IT solutions -Establishing and maintaining strong, strategic partnerships with vendors and service suppliers -Responsible for Vendor Management and ensuring Service Level Agreements are met
CustomField.label: Project Management [IT]
